name: The planet
description:
This is the game i made for the event : 10 hours game by Brackeys.

This is a short platformer on a planet. You must find your 2 garages pass to take your spaceship.

The game is a litlle bit buggy... If you're stock in the wall use the teleportation ( on a controller : back / on a keyboard : T) 

You can play the game with a Xbox Controler (recomended) or a keybord
